post.body: isn't it lovely? ps--no space between the @ and the username. :]
you are always right about everything and yet i still don't always heed your advice. i'll learn. :P
i was being literal. it was really mid-calf level water until like 9pm...then it was ankle deep. haha.
(and by 15th i mean 12th) ...lame.
yes. the wedding is thursday. i'm sorta excited for school, but i so have to order my books. soon. (i go back on the 15th).
just....big formal dress, do not want.
you too. :]
i hope all that turns out right. next time, please just wait for a half-hour and let me do iiiiit. D: D:
and it would have been AMAZINGLY convenient because my dad was in Jackson today. so instead, I get to drive to jackson! NO.
"oh, your dress should be ready for pick-up tomorrow!" (this was yesterday...and they aren't open on christmas eve.)
do you have your mobile updates on? i'm trying to decide if i should turn mine on for you so i can keep up, lol.
no problem. you deserve to! don't like seeing fun people sad. :]
i love you!
well i'm sure she was all excited and stuff. way too much. i didn't see the ring too well. haha.
well my dad looked at the ring and it was like "o ok" so i have no idea. hahahahhaa oops.
uh oh. good luck.
is trying to get her room back cleaned up after dragging everything out from her closet and under her desk. wut.
is working on @lacymichelle's christmas present and...well, is pretty much covered in red paint.
is nervous about the choir show tonight.
is so frustrated with life right now.
just spent two hundred dollars on her maid of honor dress. oh my god i'm so poor...
actually pulled off a 4.0 this semester. what.
mound bayou, mississippi is the saddest little town i have ever been to.
is vacillating.
oh no.
got out of bed and into some trouble. :]
has no desire to get out of bed today.
oh. that was a massacre. damn you, ambiguous short answer questions.
still isn't prepared for stats...i mean, if I make a B, i have a B in the course. this should worry me, but a 3.83 ain't bad.
isn't thrilled with ANOVA...well, yay for stats exam tomorrow. sure.
well... we made it all night. i'm not sure if that means anything anymore, but i got my sheets changed!
is pulling an all-nighter with JVZ.
is knee deep in flood water. oh my god.
has to bake and decorate the groomscake today, try on the icky dress, and rehearsal dinner at 5:30...should i last that long.
is glad that she realized that gold and green paints blend better than yellow and green when shading foliage. woo.
is way excited about s.koehlerrrrrrr comign tomorrow.
is very upset with david's bridal right now. HIGHLY PISSED, i say.
is wondering why in the hell it's over seventy degrees outside with 80 percent humidity on CHRISTMAS EVE. WHAT.
is ready for her new phone...again!
just realized that she sent a twitter @ herself. weird.
